review.title: “J Townsend Personnel, Inc./JTP Temp Inc.”
review.pros: Pros – J Townsend Personnel, Inc./JTP Temp Inc. is the top employment agency in Mobile for top notch employment. Their jobs are the best with higher than average hourly wages. The recruiters really care and get to know their applicants as well as employers. When you work with J Townsend Personnel, Inc./JTP Temp Inc. you can rest assured that you are in caring hands.
review.cons: Cons – The only downside if it can be called that is its not a go to work tomorrow company. The recruiters match not only skills or qualifications but personalities, geography, etc.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
